bean.read: select id, name, api_key as "apiKey", secret_key as "secretKey", key_store_path as "keyStorePath", key_store_password as "keyStorePassword", production from pns_channel where id = ${this.id}
bean.read-list: select id from pns_channel order by name
select id from pns_device where channel_id = ${this.id} and (disabled is null or disabled = 0)
